text: Atarib Subdistrict () is a subdistrict of Atarib District in western Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Administrative centre is the town of Atarib. The administrative center of Atarib Subdistrict and Atarib District is the city of Atarib. At the 2004 census, the villages forming this subdistrict had a total population of 32,186. ==Cities, towns and villages== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- |+ Cities, towns and villages of !
